channel.title: Comments on: Version 1.17.1
channel.description: Brings your projects to your pocket

item.title: By: Valerio Mazzeo
item.dc:creator: Valerio Mazzeo
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../index.html#comment-73">Jordi Llonch</a>.
Yes, CI builds are on the roadmap, but priority at the moment is on push notifications.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jordi Llonch.

Yes, CI builds are on the roadmap, but priority at the moment is on push notifications.

item.title: By: Jordi Llonch
item.dc:creator: Jordi Llonch
item.description:
Thanks for this amazing app.
Any plans to support CI builds?
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for this amazing app.

Any plans to support CI builds?
